data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Ankang, Shaanxi, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ankang, Shaanxi, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ankang, Shaanxi, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Ankang.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Ankang, Shaanxi, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Hui, Muslim Chinese people might believe through him.
Father, remind your church in Ankang that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Ankang to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Ankang, Shaanxi, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
